sentences.english: You may sleep on the deck or in the hold, as you prefer. Ysilla will find bedding for you.
sentences.chinese: 你睡在甲板還是貨倉隨你便，伊西拉會給你找點鋪蓋。

sentences.english: Warehousing – we renting several warehouses occupying more than total 1000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 公司在各口岸自營超過1，000平方米的貨倉。

sentences.english: It is the responsibility of the warehouseman to check data concerning transport vehicles and loaded goods.
sentences.chinese: 貨倉管理員負責對運輸車輛及轉載貨物資料的核對。

sentences.english: Daylight flooded the cargo area as the steel door broke free.
sentences.chinese: 當那扇鋼製的門掙脫鉸鏈時，陽光一下子湧進貨倉。

sentences.english: Ensure that non HSKP staff and other people are not allowed to enter the store.
sentences.chinese: 確保非本部的人員或閒雜人等一律不準進入貨倉。

sentences.english: Purchased warehouse in Singapore for expanding godown storage business.
sentences.chinese: 購入貨倉，發展新加坡倉庫生意。

definition: counter for the display of goods/(Tw) container (for freight transport)
Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
tenement building, typically of 2-4 stories, with a shop on the ground floor and upper floors used for residential purposes (esp. in southern China)
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
